Geschenke in einer Gruppe verwichteln, egal ob Schrott oder doch etwas Sinnvolles.

Mit der Wichtelmeister App ist das kinderleicht, ganz ohne E-Mail Adresse der Teilnehmenden.

Unsere App braucht nur die Namen der Gruppenmitglieder und erstellt automatisch einen QR-Code mit den Wichtelinformationen, der dann geteilt werden kann. So weiß auch der Organisator nicht, wer wen beschenken darf.

Und so geht's:

1. Wichtelgruppe erstellen (eine Gruppe, unendlich viele Gruppen bei Wichtelmeister Pro)
2. Mitglieder hinzufügen, der Name reicht (bis zu 4 Personen, unendlich bei Wichtelmeister Pro)
3. Ausnahmen festlegen (damit sich z.B. Paare nicht gegenseitig beschenken)
4. Wichtel auslosen
5. QR-Codes mit den Teilnehmern z.B. per WhatsApp, Instagram, AirDrop usw. teilen (E-Mail geht auch, wenn auf deinem Gerät ein Mailprogramm konfiguriert ist)
6. Fertig

Zum Auslesen der QR-Codes können die Teilnehmenden einfach auf "www.wichtelmeister.de" gehen oder ein zweites Gerät verwenden

Diese App ist entstanden, weil sehr viele Anbieter die Wichtelauslosung nur mit den E-Mail Adressen der Teilnehmenden anbieten. Wir wollten das nicht!

Die Wichtelmeister App kommt ohne E-Mail Adressen, Tracking und Internet aus und ist somit perfekt für alle, denen Datenschutz wichtig ist.

The Ghost EVP/EMF Radio has been developed for exciting paranormal detection and exploration. We've put a lot of effort into making the app easy to use, so that both professional and enthusiast paranormal researchers, ghost hunters and ghost tour organizers can enjoy the experience.

If you are either easily frightened, a super skeptic "left brainer" or have a serious heart-related medical condition, you are probably better off avoiding this app.

Electronic Voice Phenomena (EVP) is the collective name for the sounds sometimes detected on electronic recordings and reminiscent of human speech. These sounds are usually found in recordings with noise or poor radio reception and are considered by many to be the voices of paranormal beings such as ghosts, spirits, demons and other energy based entities. EVP is a form of Instrumental Trans-Communication (ITC), a term coined by professor Ernst Senkowski in the 1970s.

This app has taken the traditional ghost box to the next level. As with traditional ghost boxes, chaotic noise seems to be both inviting and sensitive to paranormal manipulation. The app generates audible speech by detecting meaningful phrases and words together with properties such as gender, age and the current mood of the communicating entity. We continuously improve the app, based on user feedback, and use it during our own paranormal investigations as well.

*** Features ***
* Radio Control Panel where you control the radio in real-time.
* Brownian, Pink and White Noise generators.
* Electromagnetic Field Meter using the Magnetometer sensor of your device.
* Multiple graphical themes for the user interface.
* Record your encounters with or without the microphone of your device.
* Real-time audio visualization: Oscilloscope, Spectrometer, Voicegram and Waveform (tap to toggle).
* Text log screen: The persistent text log is where you can sort, share and delete your log.
* Quick text log: Tap on the main TV screen to toggle between the different view modes.
* Open your EVP recordings in compatible audio apps with the touch of a button.
* Optional Auto Recording which only produces recordings when something interesting is encountered.
* Optional vibration (iPhone only) and audible alarms every time an entity has been detected.
* Share your recordings with friends and family.
* Upload your recordings to your Dropbox.

Please note that the app will degrade gracefully to Performance mode when running on older hardware, which means that some features may not be available or limited when running on, for example, the iPad 2 or the iPhone 4S.


*** Languages ***
English (US/UK), Czech, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Latin, Polish, Portuguese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish and Turkish.

Completing each activity earns the Squirrel a badge. With 5 Squirrels playing for 7 badges each, that’s a whole lot of Duggee Hugs!

Games:

The Acorn Badge
Some animals collect acorns to eat through the winter. Use your excellent catching skills to fill your cart with lots of lovely acorns! Look out for those elusive Special Acorns! And be careful not to slip on the banana skins...

The Food Growing Badge
Shall we grow our own fruit and veg, Squirrels? First, you plant your seed. Next, you cover it with soil. And finally, you give it a lovely big drink of water! You’ll need to protect your plant from pests… and you’ll need to talk to it to help it grow. What green fingers you have!

The Sheep Badge
The sheep are missing? Let’s round them all up! Twist and weave your way through the trees and bushes, picking up sheep as you go. 1 sheep, 2 sheep, 3 sheep… all the way up to 10 sheep! Are you keeping count? 

The Raindance Badge
A raindance is a dance that people do to try to make it rain! This game will really get you moving. First, you’ll need to learn the steps: Clap, clap, wiggle, jump! Now you know the moves, let’s dance along to the music. Excellent…you’ve made it rain!

The Submarine Badge
How exciting... an underwater adventure! Use your finger to track the bubbles and watch as the submarine follows the trail. Collect a Jazz Fish and it’ll play you a rhythmic tune. See if you can spot the Giant Sea Stallion! 

The Paper Boat Badge
Oh no! The Ants are late for their picnic! Let’s make them a paper boat to get them safely across the pond. Practice your origami with some skillful folding. Once you’ve crafted your paper boat, finish it off with some nautical decorations. Lastly, shout ‘faster!’ and watch your boat speed across the water. 

The Sandcastle Badge
It’s the summer holidays and Duggee’s organised a day trip to the beach! Help the Squirrels earn their badge by building a fortress made of sand!

HIDE CHANNELS

Not interested in the news or don’t have kids? Choose the channels you want to hide and only keep around the ones you’re likely to watch. If you don’t have a streaming app installed, you can hide channels from those too.


ICLOUD SYNCING

Your favourite channels, hidden channels and other settings all sync via iCloud so if you have multiple devices using TV Launcher, they'll all be kept in sync.


REGION

Different parts of the UK (England, Wales, Scotland & Northern Ireland) have slight variations to their standard channels. Choose your region in the settings menu and you’ll be shown the channels you expect.


ORGANISATION

TV Launcher supports many layout configurations so you can organise your channels exactly how you’d like to find them. There’s options like a full list, grouping by app or even by category too.


CUSTOMISATION

Once you’ve organised your channels, choose how to display them with options like the ability to show channel names or group names.


SEARCH

If you can’t find the channel you’re looking for, search for it!

summary.label:
패션게임 쁘띠드레스룸 패키지2 (BBDDi DressRoom Package 2) - Hanbok : Korean Traditional Clothes, Korean Dress
상큼한 패션 로맨스 쁘띠마르샹에서 만든 드레스룸 패키지 두번째 앱입니다. 패키지2는 한국의 전통옷인 한복을 주제로 시대별로 한복을 코디할 수 있게 드레스룸이 구성되어 있습니다.
Package2은 총 37개의 드레스룸 컨텐츠로 구성되어 있고 각각의 드레스룸에는 70여개 이상의 옷 아이템들이 있습니다.

패션게임 쁘띠드레스룸 패키지2를 처음 구매하시는 분들은 패션게임 쁘띠드레스룸 패키지2 PART 버전을 먼저 무료로 다운 받으셔서 미리 제품을 확인해 보세요.

쁘띠 드레스룸의 코디방법은 선택한 옷을 세밀히 조정하고 옷의 깊이값을 직접 조절해서 모델을 코디하는 게임 방식입니다(자동으로 위치에 붙는 방식이 아닙니다). 성격급하신 분들은 많은 인내가 필요합니다^^. 조금 번거러워도 다양한 방식으로 원하는 모양대로 꾸며보실 수 있습니다.

코디방법은 크게 아래와 같습니다. 
시작화면에서 모델선택 --> 드레스룸에서 코디하고자 하는 옷선택 --> 스타일룸에서 코디하기 --> 코디한 내용 저장하거나 공유하기
*** 구체적 사용방법 ****
- 처음 실행을 해서 인트로 화면에서 37개의 모델중 한명을 선택합니다.
- Start 버튼을 눌러서 드레스룸으로 이동합니다.
- 드레스룸(DressRoom)에서 분류(헤어,상의,하의,원피스,신발,악세사리)에 따라 이동하면서 코디하고자 하는 옷을 선택하면 ItemBox로 옷이 저장됩니다.(ItemBox를 한번 더 클릭하면 선택한 옷을 삭제할 수 있습니다). 총 20개의 옷을 아이템 박스에 넣을 수 있습니다.
- 스타일룸(StyleRoom)으로 이동하여 ItemBox 에 있는 옷을 클릭하여 모델에 직접 코디해 볼 수 있습니다.
- 옷을 선택했을때 나오는 오른쪽 옷 제어 버튼을 이용하여 옷들을 세밀이 조정하실 수 있습니다. 그리고 옷의 깊이값을 바꿀 수 있습니다.
- 모델을 선택했을 때 나오는 모델 제어 버튼을 이용하여 모델의 위치나 크기 등을 변경할 수 있습니다.
- 모델을 쉽게 이동하거나 확대 축소하려면 왼쪽 잠그기 버튼을 이용하여 코디기능을 잠근 후에 드래그하면 옷은 드래그 되지 않고 모델만 이동하고 확대/축소 할 수 있습니다.
- 메뉴에서 배경불러오기를 이용하여 갤러리의 사진이나 카메라로 직접 사진을 찍어서 사진 이미지를 배경으로 가져올 수 있습니다. 아래쪽에 제공되는 패턴으로 배경을 바꿀 수 있고 more.. 버튼으로 총 37개의 배경을 바꾸어 볼 수 있습니다.
- 모델 제어 버튼에서 풍선말을 클릭하여 풍선말을 삽입하여 입력할 수 있습니다.
- 코디한 내용은 메뉴의 코디 저장하기를 이용하여 저장하고 코디 불러오기를 통해 불러올 수 있습니다.
- 코디한 내용은 공유하기(Share)로 카톡(Kakao Talk)이나 밴드(Band), 페이스북(facebook), 트위터(Tweeter), 카카오스토리(Kakao Story), 메일(Mail) 등에 공유할 수 있습니다.(코디 불러오기 화면에서도 공유하기를 이용할 수 있습니다)

그외 구체적 기능
1. 드레스룸(DressRoom)에서 작은 아이템 선택을 위해 아이템을 확대하여 선택할 수 있습니다.(핑거줌으로 확대한 후 선택할 수 있습니다)
2. 드레스룸(DressRoom)에서 아이템 박스에 총 20개까지 옷 아이템을 넣을 수 있습니다. 옷이 든 아이템 박스를 클릭하면 선택한 옷을 취소합니다
3. 스타일룸(StyleRoom)의 배경패턴을 바꾸어 볼 수 있습니다. more.. 를 클릭하여 37개의 제공된 배경을 불러올 수 있습니다.
4. 자신의 갤러리에 저장된 사진을 불러와서 배경으로 설정할 수 있습니다. 또한 사진을 바로 찍어서 배경으로 지정할 수 있습니다.
5. 불러온 배경을 확대하거나 축소, 이동, 90도 회전, 알파값(투명도) 조절 등의 편집을 할 수 있습니다.
6. 모델만 감출 수 있습니다. 자신의 사진을 모델과 비슷하게 찍어서 모델을 감추고 자신의 사진에 옷을 입혀 볼 수도 있겠죠^^
7. 스타일룸(StyleRoom)에 배치된 아이템은 드래그해서 이동할 수 있고 또한 화살표키로 천천히 또는 빠르게 움직일 수 있습니다.
8. forward, backward 버튼을 이용하여 옷의 깊이값을 바꿀 수 있습니다.
9. 모델에 입혀진 옷 아이템을 선택하기가 힘든 경우가 있어서 이전 옷, 또는 다음 옷 버튼을 이용하여 입혀진 옷을 하나씩 선택할 수 있습니다.
10. 각 옷별로 잠금기능을 제공합니다. 옷도구 상자에서 잠금을 선택하면 선택한 옷이 잠금이 되어 해당 옷은 드래그 되지 않습니다.
11. tip 으로 모델에 입혀진 샘플 5가지를 확인해 볼 수 있습니다. 핑거줌 가능합니다
12. 모델 잠금기능을 제공합니다. 모델잠금을 한 경우 옷을 하나씩 선택하거나 이동할 수 없습니다. 모델 잠금 후 모델을 확대하거나 드래그로 이동하시면 됩니다
13. 모델잠금이나 모델선택화면에서 풍선말기능을 제공합니다. 풍선말에 글을 입력하여 모델옆에 풍선말을 배치할 수 있습니다. 풍선말의 말꼬리 부분을 드래그하면 풍선말의 말꼬리 방향도 조절할 수 있습니다.
14. 스타일룸에서 모델을 확대해 볼 수 있습니다.(3배까지 확대 가능)
15. 스타일룸에서 전체화면으로 다른 도구들은 제외하고 모델만 볼 수 있는 기능을 제공합니다. 전체화면시에는 자동으로 모델잠금으로 처리됩니다.
16. 가끔씩 옷을 잘못 드래그 한경우 바로 이전 위치로 이동할 수 있습니다.(Undo 기능. 한번만 제공됩니다)
17. 저장기능을 제공합니다. 저장갯수는 제한이 없습니다. 자신이 코디한 내용을 메뉴- 코디저장하기로 저장한 후 언제든지 코디불러오기로 불러올 수 있습니다.
18. 이미지 공유기능을 제공합니다. 메뉴를 클릭해서 나오는 메뉴에서 Share My Coordination (마이코디 공유하기) 를 선택하시면 페이스북이나 트위터, 카카오톡이나 지메일등에 내가 꾸민 이미지를 공유하실 수 있습니다
19. 입혔던 옷들은 다음에 다시 앱을 실행해서 옷을 선택하는 경우 이전에 입혔던 위치를 기억해서 해당 위치에 옷이 붙도록 구현하였습니다.

Use Quantum Physics to Split Your Universe -- It's the Ultimate Decision-Maker

THIS IS THE ORIGINAL!
  • An App Store "Top Paid App"
  • An App Store "Staff Favorite"
  • Endorsed by famous physicists

And recently featured in:
  • "Something Deeply Hidden" best-selling book by Sean Carroll
  • "The Joe Rogan Experience" podcast
  • "This American Life" podcast


"According to quantum mechanics, every observation brings new universes into existence. But these universes have been completely useless to us -- until now! Universe splitter helps guarantee that there's at least one version of you who has made all the right choices."
    -- Sean Carroll, physicist at Caltech and best-selling author

"The functioning of this app is in complete agreement with the many-worlds interpretation of quantum mechanics."
   -- Garrett Lisi, PhD, Theoretical Physics


Scientists say that every quantum event plays out simultaneously in every possible way, with each possibility becoming real in a separate universe. But that was just an abstract concept... until now! Because now, you can harness this powerful and mysterious effect right from your iPhone.

When faced with a tough choice, Universe Splitter allows you to live out BOTH of your options... in separate realities.* No mere coin-flip app can make this claim!

Here's how it works:

Let's say you have to make a difficult decision — for example, whether to accept a job offer or to turn it down. Just type both actions into your Universe Splitter, and press the "Split Universe" button.

Universe Splitter will then, over the internet, activate a remote "Quantis" brand quantum device (made by id Quantique, and certified by the National Metrology Institute of Switzerland) which will send a single photon into a quantum "either/or" state. According to current scientific thinking, though, the photon will actually be in a "both, but in separate universes" state!

Within seconds, Universe Splitter will report to you which of those two universes you’re in, and by taking a different action in each, you will cause these previously identical universes to diverge.*

Of course, you won't be able to see or interact with that other universe. In fact, you may question whether anything at all happened. But according to the prevailing quantum theory, there will be two of you pondering whether anything just happened!

Right now you're probably wondering: Does this app genuinely contact a quantum device in Geneva? YES, it absolutely does, and we would be happy to provide proof of this upon request. Email eric@aerfish.com for more info.

As BDembko writes: "The real joke... is that it's NOT a joke.  Which actually makes it funnier, if you ask me.  (Kind of an Andy Kaufman kind of thing)  The guy actually went the extra 10 miles... and it seems so absurd to us, that we figure it's a joke.  But it's not... which then means it is.  This is seriously quantum humor to the extreme."

And -- if an infinite supply of universes isn't enough for you -- this app also gives you stylish, retro, machine-age graphics (complete with industrial-strength sound effects) which will underscore the awe-inspiring significance of each twist and turn of your ever-branching multiverse.

If you're a believer in the "Many Worlds" interpretation of quantum behavior, this app is a must. And if you're not, just think of this as THE most random of all coin-flip apps -- in that it uses the single most unpredictable thing in the known universe: a single quantum event!


*According to prevailing quantum theory. Universes cannot contact each other. Not responsible for user's actions. ©Copyright 2009 Eric Daniels - All Rights Reserved

^‥^ No In-App-Purchases. No Ads. ^‥^

summary.label:
A DOS to run on the iPhone and iPad.
NEW: Sound emulation and external Bluetooth Keyboard enabled!

The first Disk Operating Systems were introduced when Tape Memory was replaced with rotating Disks. This was in the 60'ies of the last century. Since then a lot has changed, but many of us remember the days when there was no Graphical User Interface.

This app now is introducing DOS for mobile devices. Not laptops, but phones. iPhone and iPad, to be precise. It is a perfect emulator of the DOS that so many games and applications in the 80'ies and 90'ies have been running on.

Win and Win95 were running on DOS, showing what a 16bit operating system is capable of. If sys ini, commanc.com, config.sys and .exe sound familiar to you, then this is the app for you.

The DOS is not just a CLI, it is a full fledged operating system. It does everything that the Ancient DOS did. It is capable of executing batch files or installing some of the game classics that never made it past DOS. It probably runs much better than the original DOS used to run on old PC's, which were state of the art back then.

30 years is old enough to be called vintage, and it brings as much power as it did back then ;-) With this app you can get this vintage feeling on your iPhone or iPad.

◆Features
    ▸ SoundCard emulation
    ▸ External Bluetooth Keyboard
    ▸ Disk Operating System
    ▸ Everything you would expect from DOS ;)

If you have ideas, feedback, suggestions or anything else you would like to tell us, do not hesitate to drop us a line!

And if you like Power DOS, be not shy to leave a good review!

Choose a group that you set up using the Philips Hue app, or create a new zone in the Firestorm for Hue app. To edit a zone in the list, swipe the item to the left and tap the pencil icon. When you add, remove, or change lights, pull down the list to refresh.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

• Sleep Timer with audio fade out. Sleep End State setting lets you choose what happens to the state of the lights when the sleep timer ends.

You want to wish your girlfriend, boyfriend, mom, dad, grandma or grandpa a happy birthday? No problem. Using SongCocktail you can send a birthday song matching their name and age.

MUSIC STYLES
● SongCocktail includes the music styles "Alps Edition“ "German Rock“, "German Pop Ballad“, "Swing Edition German“, "Swing Edition English“ and "German Schlager“.

NAMES
● You can choose from more than 800 German and 200 English Names from Aaliyah to Zita and Aaron to Zoe, spoken by the German host and dubbing actor Nick Benjamin, known as the "Voice of the ZDF“, one of the most popular German TV networks. Also available are German terms of endearment and designations like "Chef".
Furthermore, you can record your own names which will be mixed into the song. Of course there also is an option to use no name.

AGES
● Your birthday girl or boy may grow from 1 to 100 years old. If you do not know the age, you can mix a song without age.

SEND YOUR WISHES BY EMAIL OR ANOTHER APP
● You can play your song using your iOS device. Or you can send it by email to the recipient of your greetings. When sending by email, you have the ability to choose a picture from your camera roll or take a picture, if your device features a camera. You may send your wishes either as an audio or a video file.
● Share the song using Apps that support sharing, i.e. Facebook or WhatsApp.
● Save a birthday song to the Photos Library of your device to send it with any app.

DIFFERENCES FREE / FULL VERSION
● With the Free Version you cannot record names.
● Names are not free of charge in the Free Version. Once you have bought a name, you may use it as often as you like.
● The songs in the Free Version contain audio ads for SongCocktail. These ads will not be present if you use a name you have purchased.
● Videos created with the Free Version contain the URL of the SongCocktail website and the SongCocktail logo.

This application emulates the Time Circuit Panel, similar to installed into the DeLorean Time Machine, an invention of Doc Brown, the key character of one of the best movies of 80th (you know, which one - "Back To The Future").

It's not just a mock-up, but a functional timer device. "Present Time" displays the current system time of your iPhone or iPod (could be a nice stylish digital clock for your car), "Last Time Departed" is the time when you started the application for a last time. 
"Destination Time" is the time when the application will give a signal - electronic alarm sound.

On iPhone, you can enable the "88MPH Time Travel Simulation" option. After that application uses the built-in GPS to check your current speed. When it reaches 88 MPH application  plays some sounds and switching the "Present Time" to your "Destination" - like you just jumped over the time. Application "come back" automatically after several seconds. 
Please note and take this VERY SERIOUS -speed of 88 MPH is ILLEGAL on the MOST of the public roads. Double check this before your experiments and always keep the safety. 
This feature will not work well on iPods and not-3G iPads - the real hardware GPS chip is required.

On the "Time Distance" screen you can see the number of seconds, minutes, hours, days and weeks between Present and Destination time. This screen is available by tapping the "DIST" label.

 

You can change the "Destination TIme" by tapping the screen slightly above or slightly below the digits. Keypad to enter the Destination time available on tap on the Destionation time numbers. Enter "05" for March, "06" for June, etc. "0" and "1" sets the AM/PM time.

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions about additional functionality, there is a big chance they will be implemented in next release. Please forward your requests to support@atoll-ordenadores.com email address.

Get your party started using your Philips Hue lights. Watch your lights pulse and flash to your favorite songs.*

*Hue Bridge required

MODES

• Music Visualizer — Lights change colors to the music (device microphone required)
• Strobe — Lights change colors in a flash randomly
• Color Loop — Lights change colors simultaneously
• Color Flow — Lights change colors sequentially
• Playlist — Each mode plays for a random duration

THEMES

Choose from one of the predefined themes or create your own on the Themes tab. Each mode uses the colors in the selected theme. To edit a user theme in the list, swipe the item to the left and tap the pencil icon. You can reorder colors for the Color Loop mode.

SETTINGS

Music Visualizer
• Set the volume trigger for the light effects
• Change minimum brightness of the lights when inactive
• Change maximum brightness of the light effects
• Change transition effects (random, pulse, fade quickly, fade slowly)
• Change theme
• Toggle detect frequencies (Bass, Mid, Treble)

Bass, Mid, Treble (Music Visualizer)
• Toggle light effects
• Target lights for effects
• Change transition effects (random, pulse, fade quickly, fade slowly)
• Change theme
• Change frequency range trigger

Strobe
• Change minimum brightness of the lights when inactive
• Change maximum brightness of the light effects
• Change theme

Color Loop, Color Flow
• Change brightness of the lights
• Change color or light sequence (in order, reverse order, random order)
• Change transition effects (random, pulse, fade quickly, fade slowly)
• Change transition timeout
• Change theme

Playlist
• Change sequence (in order, reverse order, random order)
• Change order
• Toggle modes
• Change duration range for each mode

General
• Change default end state (revert, off)
• Change sleep end state (revert, off)
• Auto-start and Auto-stop mode

LIGHTS / GROUPS

Select one or more lights for your light show on the Lights tab. Choose a group that you set up using the Philips Hue app, or create a new zone in the Soundstorm for Hue app. To edit a room or zone in the list, swipe the item to the left and tap the pencil icon. You can reorder lights for the Color Flow mode. When you add, remove, or change lights, pull down the list to refresh.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

• Sleep Timer — Sleep End State setting lets you choose what happens to the state of the lights when the sleep timer ends.

All the cities are decorated, snow is everywhere and people have a beautiful tree in their living room. This means just one thing: It is Christmas!

Make this year's Christmas Eve special by adding some more miraculous moments with this Christmas bell app. The app was specially developed for parents to use it in order to surprise their children. It includes the following features:

- You can choose between three amazing bells with especially high audio quality.
- You can set a timer when the bell should be played.
- You can choose how often the bell should be ringed.
- You can save your settings in the morning, so you are perfectly prepared for a wonderful evening.

We hope you enjoy this app and we wish you a Merry​ Christmas!

Wachsgiessen oder Bleigiessen macht nur Spaß mit der richtigen Vorhersage! Mit diesem Lexikon erhalten Sie über 400 Hinweise für Ihre Zukunft!
Neben dem Lexikon steht eine Taschenlampe zur Abbildung des gegossenen Objektes zur Verfügung. Die Helligkeit der Taschenlampe ist individuell einstellbar.
Mit der Countdown-Funktion ist gewährleistet, dass man in der Hektik den Jahreswechsel nicht verpasst.
Wer an anderen Tagen als Silvester zur Mitternacht Bleigiessen oder Wachsgiessen möchte, kann dies durch Aktivieren des Schalters "Mitternacht heute" tun und der Countdown bezieht sich dann auf die aktuelle Nacht.

Viel Spaß und viel Glück!
